mapper.sql: B.ID, B.ZJQDID, B.FJZCH, B.BJLX, JH, XLH, NBSBM, DJBH, ZWMS, ZT, WHSJ, DPRTCODE
mapper.select: select b1.xlh fj_xlh, b2.xlh zf_xlh, b3.xlh yf_xlh from d_007 b1 left join b_s_003 b2 on b1.fjzch = b2.fjzch and b1.dprtcode = b2.dprtcode and b2.zt = 1 and b2.sxzt = 1 and b2.wz = 1 and b2.cj = 1 left join b_s_003 b3 on b1.fjzch = b3.fjzch and b1.dprtcode = b3.dprtcode and b3.zt = 1 and b3.sxzt = 1 and b3.wz = 2 and b3.cj = 1 where b1.fjzch = #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b1.dprtcode = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into B_S_00103
ID,
ZJQDID,
FJZCH,
BJLX,
JH,
XLH,
NBSBM,
DJBH,

WHDWID,
WHRID,
WHSJ,
DPRTCODE,
TBBS,
WXFABH,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zjqdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bjlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{jh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{nbsbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{zwms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tbbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.select:
WITH NEWESTDJXH AS ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B_G_012.WXFABH,B_G_012.DJBH,B_G_012.ID,B_G_012.ZWMS,B_G_012.BZ,B_G_012.BB,B_G_012.DPRTCODE,MAX(BB) OVER (PARTITION BY WXFABH, DJBH, DPRTCODE) MAXBB FROM B_G_012 WHERE ZT = 3 AND YXX = 1 )A WHERE A.BB = A.MAXBB )
SELECT S1.ID, S1.ZJQDID, S1.FJZCH, B1.DJBH, B1.ZWMS, B1.BB, B2.JKLBH, B2.JKFLBH, B2.ZQZ, S2.ID AS ITEMID, S2.JK_SZ, B2.DW AS JK_DW, D2.MS as JKLMS, D2.MS as MS FROM B_S_00103 S1 INNER JOIN NEWESTDJXH B1 ON S1.DJBH = B1.DJBH AND S1.WXFABH = B1.WXFABH AND S1.DPRTCODE = B1.DPRTCODE INNER JOIN B_G_01201 B2 ON B1.ID = B2.DJXMID AND B2.ZT = 1 LEFT JOIN B_S_0010301 S2 ON S1.ID = S2.MAINID AND B2.JKLBH = S2.JKLBH AND S2.ZT = 1 LEFT JOIN D_006 D1 ON B2.JKFLBH = D1.JKFLBH LEFT JOIN D_00601 D2 ON B2.JKLBH = D2.JKLBH WHERE S1.ZJQDID = #{zjqdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND S1.ZT = 1 ORDER BY D1.PXH,D2.PXH
mapper.update:
update B_S_00103
ZJQDID = #{zjqdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FJZCH = #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BJLX = #{bjlx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JH = #{jh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XLH = #{xlh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NBSBM = #{nbsbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DJBH = #{djbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZWMS = #{zwms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TBBS = #{tbbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WXFABH = #{wxfabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE B_S_00103 set ZT = 0 , TBBS = 1, WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE ZJQDID IN (SELECT ID FROM B_S_001 B START WITH ID = #{zjqdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} CONNECT BY PRIOR B.ID = B.FJDID)
mapper.select:
SELECT B1.ID, B1.ZJQDID, B1.FJZCH, B1.BJLX, B1.JH, B1.XLH, B1.NBSBM, B1.DJBH, B1.ZWMS, B1.ZT, B1.WHSJ, B1.DPRTCODE FROM B_S_00103 B1 WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM B_S_001 B2 INNER JOIN D_007 D1 ON B2.FJZCH = D1.FJZCH AND B2.DPRTCODE = D1.DPRTCODE INNER JOIN B_G_011 B3 ON D1.FJJX = B3.JX AND D1.DPRTCODE = B3.DPRTCODE AND B3.WXFABH = #{wxfabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B3.BB = #{wxfabb,jdbcType=DECIMAL} INNER JOIN B_G_012 B4 ON B4.WXFABH = B3.WXFABH AND B4.DPRTCODE = B3.DPRTCODE AND B4.ZT NOT IN(8,9)
AND B4.DJBH IN
#{item}
WHERE B1.ZJQDID = B2.ID AND B1.ZT = 1 AND B1.DJBH = B4.DJBH AND B1.WXFABH = B4.WXFABH )
mapper.update:
UPDATE B_S_00103 set TBBS = 1, WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id in
#{item.id}
